overview: In addition to serving as President and CFO for HMD, Terry is also a co-founder and principal in Evergreen Investments and Management, an early-stage venture capital firm based in Brentwood, Tennessee. Terry has held senior financial positions with General Care Corp., Hospital Corporation of America, HealthTrust, PhyCor, MedAlliance, and PrincipalCare. He has extensive experience in the financial management of start-up and high-growth companies, most notably as a founder and CFO of PhyCor. He currently serves as a director for Encore Interactive Solutions, Igaea, and ebiz-America. He holds a bachelor’s degree in accounting from Tennessee Technological University and is a Certified Public Accountant (Inactive).
